adminProducts.noProductsDescription: Create your first product or adjust the filters.

about.title: About this Project
about.subtitle: A Web Engineering Project by IBAW

project.title: The Project
project.description: This online shop was created as part of my training as a Web Engineer at IBAW. The project was entirely developed from scratch and demonstrates the practical application of modern web technologies.

frontend.title: Frontend (React/Next.js) Overview
frontend.react: Complete React application with Next.js and TypeScript
frontend.i18n: Multilingual support with i18n for UI elements and transKey for products in German, English, and French
frontend.socket: Real-time updates with Socket.io for products and cart (guests in the same browser and for logged-in users across browsers and devices)
frontend.oauth: Google OAuth integration for social login and custom solution for learning purposes

shop.title: Shop Functions
shop.desc: Product catalog, product overview, homepage, cart, checkout process, general pages like terms and conditions, privacy policy, etc.

scope.title: Project Scope
scope.description: This project comprises nearly 100 self-written components and over 20,000 lines of code. Everything from the database structure to the API and the frontend was independently developed.

about.disclaimer: This is a learning project and serves demonstration purposes. The majority of images and product descriptions were sourced from kaffeezentrale.ch (in agreement with the helpful team at Kaffee Zentrale, where all my products can be purchased at significantly better prices).

auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to your account to continue

blog.noPostsFiltered: Try adjusting your search criteria or clearing filters.
blog.noPostsYet: No blog posts have been published yet.

cart.stock_warning: We currently only have {{quantity}} in stock and had to adjust your cart
cart.title: Shopping Cart

checkout.emailConfirmation: You would receive an email confirmation shortly.
checkout.shipNotification: We would notify you when your order would ship
checkout.supportContact: Questions about your order? Contact us at support@myshop.com
checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.whatsNext: What would happen next if this were a real web shop?

banner.description: We only use essential cookies that are necessary for the operation of this website. These cookies do not store any personal data and are required for basic functions like authentication.
banner.title: Cookie Settings

essential.description: These cookies are required for the basic functionality of the website and cannot be disabled.
essential.title: Essential Cookies

error.invalidPhoneNumber: This is not a valid phone number.

needAccount.answer: No, you can shop as a guest. However, creating an account offers benefits like order history, faster checkout, and exclusive offers.
needAccount.question: Do I need an account to shop?

resetPassword.answer: Click on 'Forgot password?' on the login page and enter your email address. You will receive instructions to reset your password via email.
resetPassword.question: How can I reset my password?

unsubscribeNewsletter.answer: You can unsubscribe from the newsletter by clicking the unsubscribe link in any newsletter email or by adjusting your preferences in your account settings.
unsubscribeNewsletter.question: How can I unsubscribe from the newsletter?

contact.description: If you have questions that are not answered here, please contact us:

faq.disclaimer: Please note that this FAQ contains general information. For specific questions, please contact our customer service.

changeOrder.answer: Order changes are only possible within 2 hours after placing the order. Please contact our customer service immediately if you need to make changes.
changeOrder.question: Can I change my order after placing it?

howToOrder.answer: You can easily place an order by adding the desired products to your shopping cart and following the checkout process. You can pay as a guest or create an account for faster future orders.
howToOrder.question: How can I place an order?

paymentMethods.answer: We accept the following payment methods:
paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?

availability.answer: If a product is out of stock, it will be marked accordingly. You can sign up for stock notifications to be informed when the product is available again.
availability.question: What if a product is out of stock?

colorAccuracy.answer: We strive to display colors as accurately as possible. However, colors may vary slightly depending on your screen settings. If you are not satisfied with the color, you can return the product within 30 days.
colorAccuracy.question: Are the product colors displayed correctly?

canReturn.answer: Yes, you can return unused products in original packaging within 30 days of delivery. Please use our return form and include it with your return shipment.
canReturn.question: Can I return products?

refundTime.answer: Refunds are processed within 5-10 business days after we receive the returned items. The refund will be credited to your original payment method.
refundTime.question: When will I receive my refund?

returnCosts.answer: For returns due to defects or our error, we cover the return shipping costs. For returns due to change of mind, the customer covers the return shipping costs.
returnCosts.question: Who pays for return shipping?

deliveryTime.answer: Standard delivery within Switzerland takes 2-3 business days. Express delivery is available and takes 1 business day. International deliveries may take 5-10 business days depending on the destination.
deliveryTime.question: How long does delivery take?

shippingCosts.answer: Shipping within Switzerland is free for orders over CHF 50. For smaller orders, shipping costs CHF 7.90. Express delivery costs an additional CHF 15. International shipping costs vary by destination.
shippingCosts.question: How much does shipping cost?

trackOrder.answer: Once your order has been shipped, you will receive a tracking number via email. You can use this number to track your package on our website or the carrier's website.
trackOrder.question: How can I track my order?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

feedback.cart-stock-not-valid: The requested quantity is no longer available
feedback.order-number-missing: Order created but order number missing. Check console for details.
feedback.payment-method-not-found: Payment method not found. Please go back to payment step.

copyright.disclaimer: All prices include VAT plus shipping costs and possible cash on delivery fees, unless otherwise stated.

social.description: Stay updated on new products and exclusive offers.
social.title: Newsletter

modals.unsaved-changes-message: You have unsaved changes. Do you really want to proceed?

passwordChange.passwordChangeError: An error occurred while changing password
passwordChange.passwordMissingCase: Password must contain both uppercase and lowercase letters
passwordChange.passwordMissingNumber: Password must contain at least one number
passwordChange.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters long

orders.desc: When placing an order, we additionally store:
orders.legalBasis: Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR (Contract fulfillment) and Art. 6(1)(c) GDPR (Legal obligation)
orders.retention: 10 years according to legal retention obligations (tax law)
orders.title: Order Data

registration.desc: When creating a user account, we collect the following data:
registration.name: First and last name
registration.retention: Until deletion of the account by the user
registration.title: Registration

cloudinary.desc: For optimized display and delivery of product images, we use the cloud service Cloudinary. When loading images, the following data is transmitted to Cloudinary:
cloudinary.legalBasis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (Legitimate interest in fast and optimized image delivery)
cloudinary.title: Cloudinary (Image Hosting)

googleFonts.desc: This website uses Google Fonts and Material Icons for uniform display of fonts. When you access a page, your browser loads the required fonts into your browser cache to display texts and icons correctly.
googleFonts.legalBasis: Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR (Legitimate interest in uniform presentation of our website)
googleFonts.title: Google Fonts and Material Icons

noSharing.delivery: To shipping providers for delivering your order
noSharing.exceptions: Data is only shared in the following cases:
noSharing.statement: We never sell, rent or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes.
noSharing.title: 7. No Sharing with Third Parties

overview.dataCollectionDesc: We only collect data necessary for operating the online shop: account data (email, name), order data (delivery address, billing address), payment status and language settings.
overview.dataProtection: How do we protect your data?
overview.dataProtectionDesc: We use SSL encryption, secure servers and never sell your data to third parties. Payment data is processed directly by Stripe and not stored on our servers.
overview.dataUse: How do we use your data?
overview.dataUseDesc: Your data is used exclusively for processing your orders, managing your customer account and improving your shopping experience.
overview.intro: The following information provides a simple overview of what happens to your personal data when you visit and use our online shop.
overview.title: 1. Privacy at a Glance

stripe.data: The following data is transmitted to Stripe:
stripe.desc: We use the payment service provider Stripe for payment processing. Your payment data is entered directly via the encrypted connection to Stripe.
stripe.name: Cardholder name
stripe.storage: We do not store any credit card data. We only receive a transaction ID and payment status from Stripe.

responsible.text: The data controller for this website is:
responsible.title: 2. Data Controller

security.disclaimer: Despite all security measures, absolute security cannot be guaranteed for data transmission on the Internet.
security.measures: We implement the following security measures to protect your data:
security.ssl: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmissions
security.title: 6. Data Security

serverLogs.desc: The provider automatically collects and stores information in server log files that your browser transmits:
serverLogs.purpose: This data is only used for statistical analysis and to ensure trouble-free operation of the website. This data is not merged with other data sources.
serverLogs.title: Server Log Files

visitData.title: 3. Data Collection When Visiting the Website

product.connectionLost: Connection lost - Data may not be updated in real time
